segments.text: Oh, what a sneaky little operation in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are up to no good with that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's balancing on the stool, hand deep in the treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister's right there, ready to catch her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Mom's at the sink, totally unaware, drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water's overflowing, that's a surprise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's making a mess on the floor, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in it, yet she keeps going.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the tidy garden outside is perfect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: These kids are clever, pulling this off right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at their adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Though the stool does look a tad unsteady.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, it's a joyful bit of mischief on a sunny day.
segments.speaker: PAR
